SampleRecipeID1 (Any string.).climate_temperature: KILN (If this is removed, it will be forced to NORMAL.)
SampleRecipeID1 (Any string.).climate_humidity: DRY (If this is removed, it will be unspecified.)
SampleRecipeID1 (Any string.).climate_airflow: TIGHT (If this is removed, it will be unspecified.)

input.ore_dict: ore_dict name is acceptable as input.
